entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -32.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 5:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -32.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -36.6°C
Wind: NW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
